AbilityDescription: Powers up moves of the same type as the doggo.
Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Damages the attacker if it contacts the doggo with a finishing hit.
Eliminates the effects of weather.
Boosts move power when the doggo moves last.
The doggo is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
The doggo can sense an opposing doggo's dangerous moves.
Prevents opposing doggo from fleeing.
Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing doggo.
Powers up ally doggo's special moves.
Hard armor protects the doggo from critical hits.
Defeating an opposing doggo strengthens the doggo's bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
The doggo boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a doggo.
Boosts the doggo's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Protects the doggo from Defense-lowering effects.
Powers up Fire-type moves when the doggo's HP is low.
Protects the doggo from some ball and bomb moves.
Avoids sound-based moves.
Restores HP as well when the doggo eats a Berry.
Boosts the doggo's Speed stat in sunshine.
Prevents other doggo's moves or Abilities from lowering the doggo's stats.
Eliminates the effects of weather.
The doggo's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
The doggo's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
The doggo can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
May disable a move used on the doggo.
Contact with the doggo may cause infatuation.
Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
When another doggo uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
Powers up each doggo's Dark-type moves.
Surprises the opposing doggo, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
Halves the doggo's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Boosts the doggo's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
The doggo changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.
The doggo changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.
Once per battle, the shroud that covers the doggo can protect it from an attack.
Compares an opposing doggo's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.
The doggo makes it rain when it enters a battle.
Turns the sunlight harsh when the doggo enters a battle.
Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in sunshine, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.
The doggo awakens twice as fast as other doggo from sleep.
Contact with the doggo may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the doggo enters a battle.
The doggo, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Powers up each doggo's Fairy-type moves.
Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Contact with the doggo may burn the attacker.
Powers up special attacks when the doggo is burned.
Powers up the doggo's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies when it is sunny.
Ally Grass-type doggo are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.
Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
The doggo transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
When it enters a battle, the doggo can tell one of the moves an opposing doggo has.
Reduces damage done to allies.
When it enters a battle, the doggo can check an opposing doggo's held item.
Prevents other doggo's moves or Abilities from lowering the doggo's stats.
Halves the damage from physical moves.
Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the doggo's HP is full.
Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Makes the doggo eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
Contact with the doggo lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Boosts the doggo's Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the doggo enters a battle.
It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the doggo's Attack stat.
May create another Berry after one is used.
Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.
The heatproof body of the doggo halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Doubles the doggo's weight.
The doggo may gather Honey after a battle.
Doubles the doggo's Attack stat.
Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Heals status conditions if it's raining.
The doggo's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other doggo from lowering its Attack stat.
The doggo gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
Raises the likelihood of meeting wild doggo by illuminating the surroundings.
Comes out disguised as the doggo in the party's last spot.
The immune system of the doggo prevents it from getting poisoned.
The doggo transforms itself into the doggo it's facing.
Passes through the opposing doggo's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
The doggo's intensely focused, and that protects the doggo from flinching.
The doggo is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
The doggo intimidates opposing doggo upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.
Powers up punching moves.
Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the doggo, for justice.
Keen eyes prevent other doggo from lowering this doggo's accuracy.
The doggo can't use any held items.
Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.
By floating in the air, the doggo receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Halves the doggo's weight.
The doggo draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
Its limber body protects the doggo from paralysis.
Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
The doggo uses its moves without making contact with the target.
Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.
The doggo only takes damage from attacks.
The doggo steals the held item of a doggo it hits with a move.
The doggo is covered with hot magma, which prevents the doggo from becoming frozen.
Prevents Steel-type doggo from escaping using its magnetic force.
The doggo's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Powers up aura and pulse moves.
The doggo's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the doggo if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the doggo enters a battle.
Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
The doggo shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any doggo.
Reduces the amount of damage the doggo takes when its HP is full.
Changes the doggo's type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.
Contact with the doggo changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.
All status conditions heal when the doggo switches out.
Powers up moves that are super effective.
The doggo employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

Names: Lord Geoffrey Wiggleton of the Yorkshire Wiggletons
AbilityDescription: All the doggo's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Names: Smokey Bottom Jeans Boots With the Fur
AbilityDescription: The doggo is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
Protects the doggo from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Powers up Grass-type moves when the doggo's HP is low.
This doggo has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Parent and child each attacks.
Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.
The doggo may pick up the item an opposing doggo used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the doggo if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Restores HP if the doggo is poisoned, instead of losing HP.
Contact with the doggo may poison the attacker.
